GR14kbss_1-u:3012: tad api tava vaco no laṅghanīyaṃ kadāpi
GR14kbss_1-u:3013: anunaya prathamaṃ tāṃ kintu yuktyā hi vṛddhāṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3014: parivadati tu yā mām āśu labdhvāpi rāyam
GR14kbss_1-u:3028: janaś chidrānveṣī sa khalu capalo nanda-tanayaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3031: na ati hṛdayaṃ kiṃ nu karavai/
GR14kbss_1-u:3035: mātaḥ/ satyaṃ vadati bhavatī kiṃca gopendra-sūnur
GR14kbss_1-u:3043: bhītir nītis tava nava-vadhū-pālanaṃ cāpi yuktam
GR14kbss_1-u:3044: māśaṅkiṣṭhās tad ayati yathā dṛk-pathaṃ nāsya sādhvyāś
GR14kbss_1-u:3045: chāyāpy asyāḥ svayam aham imāṃ drāk tathā te'rpayāmi
GR14kbss_1-u:3064: py anicchuvad gantum uvāca tāṃ sakhīm
GR14kbss_1-u:3065: astīha kṛtyaṃ na ca me yiyāsutā
GR14kbss_1-u:3078: kim iha satīḥ sa jahāti lokanāthaḥ?
GR14kbss_1-u:3087: kim api nigadya babhūva sāpi tūṣṇīm
GR14kbss_1-u:3093: bhītāsi kiṃ sādhvy aham asmy avitrī-
GR14kbss_1-u:3127: bhartā gobhiḥ svagoṣṭhe ghaṭayitum akhilāṃ rātrim eva nyavātsīt
GR14kbss_1-u:3128: vakṣaḥ prodyan nakhāṅkāvali-citam adharaḥ spaṣṭa-danta-kṣato yat
GR14kbss_1-u:3129: tat sādhvyās te satītvaṃ samucitam adhunā vyaktam ullālasīti
GR14kbss_1-u:3139: adaśad adharam uccais tan-nakhāco itaṃ tad-
GR14kbss_1-u:3140: dhṛdayam idam amuṣyāḥ kiṃ vṛthā śaṅkase tvam
GR14kbss_1-u:3170: yadi calati tadā kutaḥ kva yāmī-
GR14kbss_1-u:3217: kim api jagāda ca tāṃ tadaiva kaundī
GR14kbss_1-u:3221: tava savayaḥ sada eva yat pramāṇam
GR14kbss_1-u:3225: dhṛtim iha hṛdi dhartum īśiṣe no
GR14kbss_1-u:3236: tad api niyokṣyasi hā punas tam asyām
GR14kbss_1-u:3292: sakhi/ kim aparam asti vartma pādau
GR14kbss_1-u:3293: na mama puraś calato 'sya kiṃ karomi
GR14kbss_1-u:3298: karaṇa-paṭus tava kiṃ bhiyā hriyā vā
GR14kbss_1-u:3300: laghu laghu gantum iyeṣa sā tad agre
GR14kbss_1-u:3307: laya iti varṇayituṃ na gīr apīṣṭe
GR14kbss_1-u:3335: bhavasi na vety uditāha sā svasakhyā
GR14kbss_1-u:3365: saprāṇāḥ kim amī ime kim atha vety unmīlataḥ saṃśayād-
GR14kbss_1-u:3437: dara-rucir api vatsaḥ saspṛhaṃ me yathātti
GR14kbss_1-u:3449: tvam iha rasavatīṃ me yāhi rādhe/ prayatnāt
GR14kbss_1-u:3459: trijagati na hi kaścit tvām ṛte yasya vettā
GR14kbss_1-u:3504: śaśimukhi/ va akāni tvaṃ vidhehi prayatnād
GR14kbss_1-u:3627: pālīḥ smitena mṛdunā vacasā ca bālā
GR14kbss_1-u:3644: yad yena yena vidhinā ruciratvam etya
GR14kbss_1-u:3645: yad vyañjane yad upayujyata ity avetya
GR14kbss_1-u:3681: yad yatra yatra lavaṇaṃ ca tathā pramāṇaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3701: kim api jagāda paṭur baṭuṃ miṣeṇa
GR14kbss_1-u:3706: kiṃ kiṃ tvayā sādhitam etayā saha
GR14kbss_1-u:3715: rādhāṃ praśaṃsanty atha tāṃ ca rohiṇī
GR14kbss_1-u:3903: madhye hemamayī vyadhāyi rucirā pātrī śubhair odanaiḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3909: yuktāṃ dakṣiṇato nidhāya nika e tasyāś ca bhṛṅgārakān
GR14kbss_1-u:3910: karpūreṇa suvāsitena payasā pūrṇān vyadhāt kānakān
GR14kbss_1-u:3916: ānetuṃ prajighāya vatsala-manāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ ca rāmaṃ ca sā
GR14kbss_1-u:3917: dhātreyīm atha tau samīyatur atiśraddhā-vaśād añjasā
GR14kbss_1-u:3921: natvā mātaram ājñayā saha-balas tasyāḥ samullāsanaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:3935: mātṛbhyāṃ krama-darśitena hi pathā bhoktuṃ samārabdhavān
GR14kbss_1-u:3936: yad yad bhoktum upakramaṃ sma kurute tyaktuṃ na tat soḍhavān
GR14kbss_1-u:3937: bhoktuṃ tat tad aśeṣam apy abhilaṣan sāmarthyavāṃś ca svayaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:3938: kiñcit kiñcid abhukta vīkṣaka-bhiyā durvāda-bhītyāpy ayam
GR14kbss_1-u:3943: svāduṅkāram adann avāg api hṛdā so 'pi praśaṃsann alam
GR14kbss_1-u:3950: ny ādan mātṛ-mude bhaved api yathā paktrī-manorañjanā
GR14kbss_1-u:3951: tān sarvān saha-bhojinaḥ sarasayā vācā hasan hāsayan
GR14kbss_1-u:3952: bhuñjadhvaṃ na parityajeta kim apīty ekāntam āhlādayan
GR14kbss_1-u:4032: kīśeśo dadhi-lampa o 'yam iti tān kṛtvonmukhāṃs tad-diśi
GR14kbss_1-u:4033: teṣāṃ bhojana-bhājaneṣu śanakair nikṣipya bhakṣyaṃ nijaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4034: sarvaṃ bhuktam idaṃ mayeti sa punar garvāyamāno 'vadat
GR14kbss_1-u:4319: svāduṅkāraṃ kamala-nayanaḥ saspṛhaṃ tat tad annaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4322: prāśnann ambā-manasi nibiḍaṃ sa pramodaṃ vyatānīt
GR14kbss_1-u:4335: mṛdu mṛdu madhurānnaṃ preyasīṃ prekṣya kṛṣṇaḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:4374: kṣut-kṣāmo 'si tvaṃ ca nāśnāsi tat tām
GR14kbss_1-u:4375: ambām etāṃ māṃ ca kiṃvā dunoṣi
GR14kbss_1-u:4388: taṃ vīkṣya mandaṃ punar apy adantaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4404: py atṛptā taṃ tṛptaṃ muhur atha sutaṃ prāśayad iyam
GR14kbss_1-u:4416: ny āmṛjya sādhu mṛduleṣikayā ca dantān
GR14kbss_1-u:4432: kuleṣv atha viśaśramuḥ parijanair amī vījitāḥ
GR14kbss_1-u:4465: janani/ mayi jananyāṃ kiṃ nu lajjedṛśīyaṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4466: suta iva mama cetaḥ snihyati tvayy atīva
GR14kbss_1-u:4467: ayi tad apanayaināṃ yāmi nirmañcanaṃ te
GR14kbss_1-u:4468: śiśiraya mama netraṃ bhuṅkṣva paśyāmi sākṣāt
GR14kbss_1-u:4472: yūyaṃ ca me stha tanayās tv anayā hriyā kiṃ
GR14kbss_1-u:4481: pa air mārjitvā ca svaparijana-dattā himakarā
GR14kbss_1-u:4482: viyuktā vī īs tā vara-kanaka-gauryo bubhujire
GR14kbss_1-u:4487: tad bhūṣaṇaiḥ subahuśaḥ saha yāni yatnāt
